# Introduction

Welcome to my bookdown portfolio. Here I will show you some of the coding skills I have gathered.
This portfolio has been created with the help of the [drporthelp package](https://github.com/DanielRoodzantHU/drporthelp) which I have built to reduce the repeating of code.

Lets start with my CV which I have created using the pagedown package in R: <br>
For Dutch: [Dutch CV](./data/CV_NL/_CV_Daniël_Roodzant_NL.pdf) <br>
For English: [English CV](./data/CV_EN/_CV_Daniël_Roodzant_EN.pdf)
